name: patient_location
description: Details about the patient's location, including location ID, mnemonic, and physical type.

name: emergency_department
description: Details related to the emergency department visit, including arrival, triage, and departure times, priority information, and patient location.

name: emergency_department.edm_arrived_date_time
description: The date and time when the patient arrived at the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.edm_triaged_date_time
description: The date and time when the patient was triaged in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.edm_departure_date_time
description: The date and time when the patient departed from the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.priority_rank
description: The priority rank assigned to the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.priority_code
description: The priority code assigned to the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.priority_text
description: The priority text description for the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.treatment_room
description: Details about the treatment room assigned to the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.treatment_room.room_code
description: The code for the treatment room assigned to the patient.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.treatment_room.room_text
description: The text description for the treatment room assigned to the patient.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.reserved_room
description: Details about the reserved room for the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.reserved_room.room_code
description: The code for the reserved room for the patient.

name: emergency_department.patient_location.reserved_room.room_text
description: The text description for the reserved room for the patient.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport
description: Details about the transport information for the patient in the emergency department.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport.transport_company_code
description: The code for the transport company used for the patient.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport.transport_company_display
description: The display name for the transport company used for the patient.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport.transport_id_code
description: The transport ID code used for the patient.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport.transport_id_display
description: The display name for the transport ID used for the patient.

name: emergency_department.edm_transport.transport_call_date_time
description: The date and time when the transport was called for the patient.

name: admission_date
description: The date when the patient was admitted.

name: discharge_date
description: The date when the patient was discharged.

name: alt_admission_date_time
description: An alternative date and time for the patient's admission.

name: hl7_admission_date_time
description: The HL7 formatted date and time for the patient's admission.

name: alt_discharge_date_time
description: An alternative date and time for the patient's discharge.

name: hl7_discharge_date_time
description: The HL7 formatted date and time for the patient's discharge.
